text: Sweat is the third studio album by American rapper Nelly. The album was released on September 14, 2004. The album first debuted at number 2 on the U.S. Billboard 200 chart and also sold more than 342,000 records in its first week of release. It also peaked at number 2 on the Canadian Albums Chart, U.S. Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums, and U.S. Billboard Top Rap Albums charts, 11 on the UK Albums Chart and 17 on the German Albums Chart. The singles were "Flap Your Wings," "Na-Nana-Na" and "Tilt Ya Head Back." ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Nelly albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Funk albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Sweat (album)
